attributes.action: Create residents parking in Tewkesbury Gloucestershire.
attributes.additional_details: create parking for residents along Barton Road and the surrounding town centre housing. People are getting parking tickets left right and centre as there is always a traffic warden on hand surprisingly enough. It totally unfair and resident are the ones who are suffering while the government pocket the profit for the lack of a basic necessity for residents.
attributes.background: There is no parking for residents in the centre of tewkesbury,  especially along Barton Road and in and around the surronding town centre housing.

rejection.details:
Provision of parking is a matter for private landowners and local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons.

You can petition Tewkesbury Borough Council directly here: https://www.tewkesbury.gov.uk/petitions-and-public-participation
